name: Thomas Keßelheim
content: Prof. Dr. Thomas Kesselheim [Informatik-Abteilung V] University of Bonn · Institute of Computer Science · Algorithms and Complexity Sidebar Home People Research Research Seminar Teaching Portfolio By semester (including past and future semesters) Current Semester (WiSe 2025/26) Bachelor BA-INF 032 - Algorithmen und Berechnungskomplexität I BA-INF 011 - Logik und diskrete Strukturen Master MA-INF 1218 - Algorithms and Uncertainty MA-INF 1323 - Computational Topology MA-INF 1203 - Discrete and Computational Geometry Prof. Dr. Thomas Kesselheim University of Bonn Institute of Computer Science, Dept.
